title: OAuthCredentials
description: OAuth 2.0 credentials for connector authentication (stored for internal use by OpenMetadata MCP server)

clientId.title: OAuth Client ID
clientId.description: OAuth 2.0 client identifier for the connector application

refreshToken.title: Refresh Token
refreshToken.description: Long-lived refresh token for automatic access token renewal without user interaction

accessToken.title: Access Token
accessToken.description: Current access token (automatically refreshed when expired)

expiresAt.title: Token Expiry Timestamp
expiresAt.description: Unix timestamp (seconds since epoch) when the access token expires. Uses int64 to avoid Y2038 overflow.

tokenEndpoint.title: Token Endpoint URL
tokenEndpoint.description: OAuth token endpoint for internal token refresh operations. If not specified, will be inferred from connector configuration.

scopes.title: OAuth Scopes
scopes.description: List of OAuth scopes granted to this application
